title: FS - T206 Ty Cobb Bat on SC 150/30 SGC 2
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Ty Cobb Bat on SC 150/30 SGC 2
posts.post_content:
Prices net to me include registered shipping/insurance. PP/FF, Check MO are OK.

Cobb Bat on Shoulder S.C. 150/30 SGC 2 - Sold. Nice card, no major creasing. There are some light surface wrinkles that do not show on the revere. Back is clean and bold.

Young Glove Shows Sov 350 PSA 2 - $Sold.

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1127&pictureid=27752[/IMG][IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1128&pictureid=27753[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1127&pictureid=28377[/IMG][IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1128&pictureid=28375[/IMG]

Bump. 

Would also be interested in a trade for a PSA /SGC Ruth Exhibit or V122 Willards Ruth.

Thanks for looking.
Bump on the Cobb. Young sold.
Slight price reduction. Thanks for looking.
